item.description:
It may be a crowded evening at the pubs on the west side - Octoberfest is in the air. Feeling the need to get out of the house and mingle, or bury your gray day sorrows in a beverage? If you are claustrophobic or don't like to the grittier side of town, this is not for you.

Join Val, asst organizer, and Mike U at the following:

E&O 8pm til about 10pm
http://www.yelp.com/b...'

Scurvy Dog 10pm til ?
http://scurvydogbar.c...
Scurvy is having free Harpoon Octoberfest beer night from 9:00pm - 11:30pm. This is a small-ish place with a very low occupancy limit (due to extreme restrictions post night club fire from years ago) that always seems to be broken. We'll try our best to be there and look for you, but be aware that this is only tentative. If they won't let us in, we may just turn around and go somewhere else with no notice.

OR
Join others in the community at the following:
E & O: Abita Brewing Co. 5-7
Avery: Wachusett Brewing Co. 7-9
Julians: Smuttynose Brewing Co. 9-?
item.name: West Side Pubs - Thursday Night
